docs.title: 🎯 PCA Classification Visualizer
docs.text:
A Streamlit-based app to explore and visualize datasets using Principal Component Analysis (PCA) in 3D.

Upload a CSV, tune feature values in real-time, and visually inspect how classification is affected by feature movements.

docs.title: 💡 Key Capabilities
docs.text:
• 3D PCA visualization
  • Class-wise color-coded scatter plots
  • Interactive sliders for custom data points
  • Real-time feedback on PCA positioning
  • Feature loading heatmaps

docs.title: Q: What kind of data can I upload?
docs.text: A: A CSV file with numeric features and one target column as the last column.

docs.title: Q: Can I use categorical data?
docs.text: A: Only if it's encoded numerically (e.g., one-hot or label encoded).

docs.title: Q: What if I have missing values?
docs.text: A: Missing values are filled using the column's mean.

docs.title: Q: What happens if I have <3 features?
docs.text: A: PCA will use all available dimensions (2D PCA).

docs.title: Q: Can I reset the sliders?
docs.text: A: Yes, using the “🔄 Reset to Mean Values” button.

docs.title: 🎛️ Interactive Sliders
docs.text: Adjust input features using sliders and observe real-time changes.

docs.title: 📊 PCA Variance Chart
docs.text: Displays individual and cumulative variance captured by components.

docs.title: 🎨 3D Scatter Visualization
docs.text:
• Different color for each class
  • Semi-transparent data points
  • Interactive point with orbit ring

docs.title: 🔬 Feature Loadings Heatmap
docs.text: Understand how each feature contributes to each component.

docs.title: 📋 Metrics Displayed
docs.text:
• Number of samples
  • Number of features
  • Number of classes

docs.title: 1. Upload Your Dataset
docs.text:
• Click "Choose a CSV file"
  • Ensure:
  • Last column = Target
  • Other columns = Numeric features

docs.title: 2. Explore Your Data
docs.text:
• Overview of rows, features, and classes
  • Missing values automatically handled

docs.title: 3. Understand PCA
docs.text:
• PCA reduces features to 2 or 3 principal components
  • Visualizes in 3D with variance contribution graphs

docs.title: 4. Interact with Sliders
docs.text:
• Adjust feature values in sidebar
  • See how the interactive point moves in PCA space

docs.title: 5. Analyze Features
docs.text:
• Heatmap shows feature importance per component
  • Bar chart shows overall variance explained
